title: Doing excellent work
author: VD
content_html:
The Fraters Libertas leading the charge for subscribers to drop the Star and Sickle in my hometown. Good onya, gentlemen. Looking forward to congratulating them on their anti-paper drive – let’s expand the movement to include the ABCNNBCBS cabal. If you don’t read it/watch it, they can’t sell advertising.

In the words of the immortal Chuck D, SHUT ‘EM DOWN!
content_text:
The Fraters Libertas leading the charge for subscribers to
drop the Star and Sickle
in my hometown.  Good onya, gentlemen.  Looking forward to congratulating them on their anti-paper drive – let’s expand the movement to include the ABCNNBCBS cabal.  If you don’t read it/watch it, they can’t sell advertising.
In the words of the immortal Chuck D, SHUT ‘EM DOWN!
